entry.title: Five Ounce Racer - Revving Up Pinewood Derby Software in Python
entry.summary:
Summary

This talk will tour you through the ins-and-outs of running a pinewood derby, my experience revving up in Python to build the derby software, and how the choice to learn Python over the alternatives provided all the fuel necessary to make the job fast and fun. Revving up on â€¦
entry.content:
Summary

This talk will tour you through the ins-and-outs of running a pinewood derby, my experience revving up in Python to build the derby software, and how the choice to learn Python over the alternatives provided all the fuel necessary to make the job fast and fun. Revving up on Python had its challenges, but also got me across the finish line with a working product and time to spare.
